title: Center the spectrum analyzer and replace FM logo with animated radio-tower overlay

requirements.summary: Reposition the AudioSpectrumAnalyzer overlay to be visually centered on screen (remove downward offset) while remaining non-interactive.
acceptanceCriteria: On common mobile viewport sizes, the spectrum analyzer renders centered in the screen (not near the bottom).
The analyzer remains non-interactive (pointer-events do not block interactions with other UI).
No layout regressions occur for TopToolbar, playback display, or audio player UI.

file_operations.description: Adjust the center-overlay container styling to remove the extra downward offset (e.g., eliminate the current margin-top) while keeping the analyzer centered via absolute positioning and transforms; ensure the overlay wrapper remains pointer-events-none and does not affect TopToolbar/RadioPlaybackDisplay/AudioPlayer layout.

requirements.summary: Remove the centered FM logo overlay from the main display and clean up related references.
acceptanceCriteria: The FM logo image is not visible anywhere in the centered main display overlay area during normal app usage.
No unused imports/components remain related to the removed centered FM overlay (project builds cleanly without unused-variable/type errors).

file_operations.description: Stop rendering the existing centered FM overlay by removing the FmRadioCenterOverlay import and JSX usage, ensuring there are no remaining references.
Delete the obsolete centered FM overlay component so the FM logo image is no longer used and no dead code remains.

requirements.summary: Add a centered animated radio-tower symbol with signal waves above the spectrum analyzer, aligned to the same center axis and non-interactive.
acceptanceCriteria: A radio-tower symbol is visible above the spectrum analyzer in the center of the screen.
The symbol includes animated signal waves (continuous, clearly noticeable animation).
The tower + waves animation performs smoothly and does not noticeably degrade rendering performance on mobile devices.
The tower symbol does not intercept pointer events (pointer-events: none).

file_operations.description: Create a lightweight React component that renders a radio-tower symbol (prefer SVG or simple divs) with animated signal waves using transform/opacity animations; ensure the root is pointer-events-none and is sized appropriately for mobile.
Extend Tailwind animations/keyframes to support smooth, GPU-friendly signal-wave and subtle tower pulse animations (transform/opacity only) that can be applied by RadioTowerOverlay.

requirements.summary: Update App center-overlay composition to a single centered vertical stack (tower above analyzer) and remove obsolete center-overlay code paths.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/App.tsx uses a single centered container for the tower-above-analyzer layout.
The analyzer remains connected to the current audio element and continues to render as before, only repositioned.
No broken/unused center overlay components remain referenced by AppContent.

file_operations.description: Refactor the center overlay into one absolute, screen-centered container that renders a vertical stack: RadioTowerOverlay above AudioSpectrumAnalyzer; keep pointer-events-none on the container, preserve the analyzer props wiring (audioElement/isPlaying/userInteracted), and remove any now-obsolete centered overlay JSX.
